content:
When meadows are grey with the morn 
In the dusk of the woods it is night: 
The oak and the birch and the pine 
War with the glimmer of light. 

Dryads brown as the leaf 
Move in the gloom of the glade; 
When meadows are grey with the morn 
Dim night in the wood has delayed. 

The cocks that crow to the land 
Are faint and hollow and shrill:
Dryads brown as the leaf 
Whisper, and hide, and are still.
cleaned: when meadows grey with the morn the dusk the woods it night the oak and the birch and the pine war with the glimmer light dryads brown as the leaf move the gloom the glade when meadows grey with the morn dim night the wood delayed the cocks that crow the land faint and hollow and shrill dryads brown as the leaf whisper and hide and still
